ocr_qa.question: According to the column size schedule, what is the cross-section of C2 on the second floor?
evidence: The column size schedule lists C2 on the second floor as W12×79.

ocr_qa.question: What is the sheet title printed in the title block?
evidence: The title block clearly states 'FOUNDATION / SLAB-ON-GRADE PLAN'.

ocr_qa.question: What is the drawing number shown on this drawing?
evidence: The lower-right corner of the title block shows the drawing number 'S1.0'.

ocr_qa.question: When was the issued date for this drawing?
evidence: The bottom of the sheet lists the issued date as 11-21-01.

spatial_qa.question: Which footing type is located at the intersection of gridlines C and 4?
evidence: The footing marker at grid C-4 is labeled 'F1'.

spatial_qa.question: Is the cast-in-place concrete stair enclosure located east or west of the gridline labeled 'K'?
evidence: The cast-in-place concrete stair enclosure appears to the right (east) of gridline K.

comparison_qa.question: Which footing type listed in the spread footing schedule has the largest dimensions?
evidence: The Spread Footing Schedule lists F10 as 10'-0" × 10'-0", the largest size on the schedule.

comparison_qa.question: Which footing type listed in the spread footing schedule has the largest thickness?
evidence: The Spread Footing Schedule lists F10 as 10'-0" × 10'-0", with the largest thickness 28" on the schedule.

counting_qa.question: How many footing typology are available on the spread footing schedule?
evidence: There are seven (7) footing typology: F1, F5, F6, F7, F8, F9, and F10.
